frontmatter.title: Building an IoT badge with ESP8266 + E-Paper

node.excerpt: What’s a Midi Fighter? A Midi Fighter is a music controller equipped with high quality arcade buttons for a great tactile feel, low latency action, and durability. Every button is also backlit with RGB LEDs, illuminating the translucent buttons with…
